summary: Update the kit basic information and kit components, only support adding kit variations and updating existing kit variation’s image, price, and model_sku, don’t support deleting existing kit variations and updating the items, main component and quantity per kit of existing kit variations
description: Update the kit basic information and kit components, only support adding kit variations and updating existing kit variation’s image, price, and model_sku, don’t support deleting existing kit variations and updating the items, main component and quantity per kit of existing kit variations.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/product/get_kit_item_info?access_token=access_token&item_id=28001430&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: warning
schema.description: Indicate waring details if hit waring. Empty if no waring happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: item_id
schema.description: ID of this kit item.

schema.name: item_name
schema.description: The name of this kit item.

schema.name: category_id
schema.description: The category of this kit item, sync from the category of the main component of this kit item.

schema.name: item_status
schema.description: Enumerated type that defines the current status of the item. Applicable values: NORMAL, BANNED, UNLIST, SELLER_DELETE, SHOPEE_DELETE, REVIEWING.

schema.name: item_sku
schema.description: An item SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller, sometimes called parent SKU. Item SKU can be assigned to an item in Shopee Listings.

schema.name: images
schema.description: Item images with 1:1 ratio.

schema.name: image_id_list
schema.description: List of image id.

schema.name: image_url_list
schema.description: List of image url.

schema.name: long_images
schema.description: Item images with 3:4 ratio.

schema.name: image_id_list
schema.description: List of image id.

schema.name: image_url_list
schema.description: List of image url.

schema.name: description_info
schema.description: Rich text description field. Only whitelist sellers can use it.

schema.name: extended_description
schema.description: If description_type is extended , Description information will be returned through this field.

schema.name: field_list
schema.description: Field of extended description.

schema.name: field_type
schema.description: Type of extended description field. See Data Definition- description_field_type (text , image).

schema.name: text
schema.description: If field_type is text, text information will be returned through this field.

schema.name: image_info
schema.description: If field_type is image, image will be returned through this field.

schema.name: image_id
schema.description: Image id.

schema.name: image_url
schema.description: Image url.

schema.name: description
schema.description: If description_type is normal, description information will be returned through this field, else description will be empty.

schema.name: description_type
schema.description: Type of description : values: See Data Definition- description_type (normal , extended).

schema.name: video_list
schema.description: Info of video list.

schema.name: video_url
schema.description: Url of video.

schema.name: thumbnail_url
schema.description: Thumbnail of video.

schema.name: duration
schema.description: Duration of video.

schema.name: attributes
schema.description: The attributes of this kit item, sync from the attributes of the main component of this kit item.

schema.name: attribute_id
schema.description: The Identify of each attribute.

schema.name: original_attribute_name
schema.description: The name of each attribute.

schema.name: value_id
schema.description: Unique identifier for value of this item attribute.

schema.name: original_value_name
schema.description: Value name of this item attribute.

schema.name: value_unit
schema.description: Value unit of this item attribute.

schema.name: weight
schema.description: The weight of this kit item, the unit is KG.

schema.name: dimension
schema.description: The dimension of this kit item.

schema.name: package_length
schema.description: The length of package for this item, the unit is CM.

schema.name: package_width
schema.description: The width of package for this item, the unit is CM.

schema.name: package_height
schema.description: The height of package for this item, the unit is CM.

schema.name: brand_info
schema.description: The brand of this kit item, sync from the brand of the main component of this kit item.

schema.name: brand_id
schema.description: Id of brand.

schema.name: original_brand_name
schema.description: Original name of brand.

schema.name: model_list
schema.description: Model info list, model number at most 9.

schema.name: model_id
schema.description: ID of this kit model.

schema.name: model_sku
schema.description: Seller SKU of this kit model.

schema.name: original_price
schema.description: Original price of this kit model.

schema.name: tier_index
schema.description: Tier index of this kit model.

schema.name: component_item_id
schema.description: ID of the item that composes this kit model.

schema.name: component_item_name
schema.description: Name of the item that composes this kit model.

schema.name: component_model_id
schema.description: ID of the model that composes this kit model.

schema.name: component_model_name
schema.description: Name of the model that composes this kit model.

schema.name: quantity
schema.description: The amount of the item/model that composes this kit model.

schema.name: main_component
schema.description: Whether this item/model is the main component for this kit.

schema.name: tier_variation_list
schema.description: Variation config of item.

schema.name: name
schema.description: Variation name.

schema.name: option_list
schema.description: Option list.

schema.name: option
schema.description: Option name.

schema.name: image_id
schema.description: Id of image.

schema.name: image_url
schema.description: Url of image.
